html: Today is my Dad’s 59th death anniversary, right on #MothersDay. That day that my mom became both my mom & dad. She raised me since & continues to do so. Even today with my status as a grandpa, she mom & dads me. Tough when needed, but mostly encourages..that’s all there is to it.pic.twitter.com/oR1K83dXTe
text: Today is my Dad’s 59th death anniversary, right on #MothersDay. That day that my mom became both my mom & dad. She raised me since & continues to do so. Even today with my status as a grandpa, she mom & dads me. Tough when needed, but mostly encourages..that’s all there is to it.pic.twitter.com/oR1K83dXTe

html: Happy Birthday, dearest @RajkummarRao! You, my friend, are warm, caring and a delight to be around. Looking forward to shooting next month. Warm hug and lots of love.
text:
Happy Birthday, dearest @RajkummarRao! 
You, my friend, are warm, caring and a delight to be around. 
Looking forward to shooting next month. Warm hug and lots of love.

html: At 0-2, A weaker team would have walked in with a hope to just about survive. Not this India team. They went for a win! Suddenly English faces look dazed. Well done India! #INDvsENG #TrentBridgeTest
text:
At 0-2, A weaker team would have walked in with a hope to just about survive. Not this India team. They went for a win!

Suddenly English faces look dazed.
Well done India!

#INDvsENG #TrentBridgeTest
